feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.10.4.9218
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 480bb50b857c6916c73ba48157c0d53bf158a23c Fixed: Rejections for Custom Format score increment
  • dbc94dbe4e66923412294529ea2a025d7d58ddec Simplify fallback to default for allowed sort keys
  • b89271fc0130039d3fc26354bfdb1d335d558cb4 Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets
  • 66fcde7325a3eb3ae5a475911cdb4c0fff323083 Include current quality in rejection message for not an upgrade
  • 463741da1fdbba5a88107063d64f518bb315bcee New: Fetch up to 1000 movies from Plex Watchlist
  • 3388fae1a5ae38838b5eff77a8a6a27e28c7679a Fix translation key for Skip Free Space Check help text
  • 72b2cfe8bed661e8492de76d6ef58f5c1fc2f56e Fixed: Parse TELESYNCH as TELESYNC (#10445) [ #10414 ]
  • d5dd5e08cab7144443d12a1aa2f05bb08cc00dfe Automated API Docs update
  • fabd40cbae6e4942981e6b8a778415a0780ff3d3 New: Allowed sort keys for paginated resources
  • 3ca327f6110e45076fc7318734479928446a8710 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate (#10418)
See More * c8041408962bef5f6ddf539d49ae7953211cc58f Fix use of min score increment in rejection message * bb43d0c79643aa333598bac263b4a662ce166a92 New: Minimum Upgrade Score for Custom Formats * 5975be369074c5d2edbe141aa84ece5e91ab1fff Fixed: Removing import lists for cast and crew from movie details * 6095819005e4ad8b3a14d0af143cdad225ad832e New: Scene and Nuked IndexerFlags for Newznab indexers * 7528882adf71bbb4074877ee352b67cb8ec476ef Gotify notification updates [ #10433, #10410 ] * c1f1307345476cb877b7780dd30527749f133256 New: Add exception to SSL Certificate validation message [ Empty or private MDBList lists shown as valid on save * 7a55b563c04c33c3a4ccba136ce6921b4ec7a1bf New: Importing `sup` files as subtitles [ #10412 ] * b4bbb71a9baa983a9f9a4fb33263fcdc2b82ecc3 Automated API Docs update * 0361299a73ac1e24813e274ac69161a937b452b8 New: Last Searched column on Wanted screens (#10392) * e11339fb838641911a86d41cfaeddb774c22c009 Fix weblate widget * fbdd3129f568704c2b90909417efb00f2464fd94 Bump version to 5.10.3 * 2843647e230cbbee8196536fdee1e933ab912976 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b6b7d30fc1ee7b34d337652d02be1abe65811918 Fix subtitle aggregation for not populated movie (#10406) * e688dfadf7ba7b435d46030f204a841058b8c1ca Fixed: Refresh tags after updating autotags * f3ce0ac6206cffe7d5268c2934dc70bdaa59075d Fixed: Linking link to movie details [ #10403 ] * f0019d622ad0b79ec83a78b32a490698b40c3076 Convert Progress Bars to TypeScript [ #10404 ] * 032e8aa9200002df50cff5c264ee7183b61c5750 Convert movie images to TypeScript [ #10402 ] * 51cd7c70baf88ea66125fd733f2efb6ca005a421 Convert NoMovie to TypeScript [ #10401 ] * 12c814ed78037234aeb6c1103076d9a40d334eb6 Improve root folder missing check for movie collections * Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * d91061163038aee659022cdefeb1919c2aa646fe Add '_temp*' to .gitignore (#10397) * c6feb27962f0bffa1bb898088f5bdc26854da971 Convert SpinnerIcon to TypeScript [ 126b6eba000528ba75934ebb003b310ab58ce921 Convert Icon to Typescript [ #10347 ] * 56fece293c4a1c9f0a77903b9820d3b74ff10b3b Convert Label to TypeScript [ #10308 ] * 4503c3d36eb3c966aed29c7be9b8a090d9dfa5f9 Convert Button to TypeScript [ #10345 ] * 0d6ce5ea49ec4db8b566da5f386a04c98542db2b Link polymorphic static typing [ #10363, #10348 ] * b4b5ad95676fdff64332258979ca585fa49cff1b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3ae634753203c88b79da6950a33faa0ca73a1c6d Convert Queue to TypeScript [ #10231 ] * a826ffdbc9cb4ba61a337baf527694ea51b00dbf Convert Blocklist to TypeScript [ #10229 ] * dc3bf9acb070b42ea4d2ce5e843a3b06310bad5a Automated API Docs update * eca95826c2a12bafbecd62decc4a1bfd503dc2a5 Fixed: Respect Quality cutoff if Custom Format cutoff isn't met * 593b943cb09104f79408f094a285ffed33a12086 New: Except language option for Language Custom Formats [ #10388 ] * a3faa9ed5fe1514c2d001a8300c0e8fcfdc62c8c Fixed: Failing to import any file for movie if one has bad encoding [ #10389 ] * 229e87f39883b9d9d60b7d74f5735042dc8ce118 Fix ignoring title based on pre-rename moviefile * fcb758bf67cc4e99c6cb83e816e208fb6d54699f Reimport files imported prematurely during script import * 0a9ae45ed11b25e57decbc345f2267f3434007b0 Do not remove all extras when script importing * b062a46cbd196fa0521b2d9a67ca630e1c83e9a7 New: Expose subtitle title and disposition in UI * ac4669dfc168dca66657b69760731be78189f261 New: Parse subtitle titles * 36d80387c692b54712c2902b7ba046c292e5e8ce Bump version to 5.10.2 * 9fe4793606775e5b2765d46f795516f5002c2f74 Fixed: Don't show today's relative time for release dates * fa80608394cd37ca6930af443e413520282e74f2 Convert RelativeDateCell to TypeScript * 6e81d5917ea44830c26782bd4bd665c32c89c026 Refactor include time for movie history [ #10039, #10045, #10046 ] * 8d189523c4c46cc997a9496b55f2d67fcbd916e0 Fixed: Forbid empty spaces in Release Profile restrictions * 4d589422e6016950c85882b3df7303e401fe9939 Fixed: Importing files without media info available * 675612e7c615c5fbe523c48a10fe4d310bcf9eeb Fixed: Existing and Already In Library icons for movie search results * be3916f67d08f4adeac33b20fd1decd5f5f3bc96 Fixed: Released as default Minimum Availability for add movie modals * 453f216e0d5d1d51b8c6ae32987b52026546746b New: Add Malayalam and Kannada languages * 2d4846e5be1dc1ca8ad2bcfedaf46a35697d05da New: Add Macedonian and Slovenian languages * 2700a6cf8a5b7a9ce61582d471a45ebda35eab69 Fixed: Paths for renamed movie files in Custom Script and Webhook [ #10359 ] * 674e414111177b8fa9f962bdc6b0846cd36283bd Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence * 21bd21b70cfc1baa6ab1f7ae882ec3690a5dae63 New: Digital and Physical release dates for Poster options * fde87a38f997ef6ed66e2a64c37a8cdad53df2f1 Convert MovieQuality to TypeScript * 0d6ba200d366256e26bdc29348ce101ab61f4c20 Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker [ #10358 ] * 93298645e312c685d5a75a143667d6d522b472c5 Render with ternary in bulk manage [ #10360 ] * 58f544e9e0d5b0512f1e156e9e3a88b9b8fe068a New: Bypass IP addresses ranges in proxies * cf952d5c0b3909ac70c6ceacfbdb7f6b25030f25 Fixed: Trim spaces and empty values in Proxy Bypass List * f6d630bdd38b93c1b495fb87a59ac9e31ff455e2 Updated code action fixall value for VSCode * 657ced4772d4975561fefbe3979490109085495b Fix disabled style for monitor toggle button * d3a0c83f98cd264f736e5c31874e68a4521f32e1 Fixed: False positive HC for MultiSubs (#10024) * 5833d5d4c4c4bf9bb448270f17b77bc1b4fd06ca Bump version to 5.10.1 * 2ba4562f49d7e1bcebcdd8ac3927a48dcf35a73f Fixed: Improve appearance and sorting by ratings for Discover [ #7271 ] * d79db69644b955967aa67cba4f4271c705870e70 Hide ratings on movie table in absence of data * 7532dfb03c5259c61c1136cfa2ff5185cc0ffd3f Remove extraneous height from movie posters * a47528aa81ca8141fcbe795f3ec46c470e5e6d51 Convert rating component to TypeScript * a812d9f39f18b04a42390ca4fa74b55931f93b73 Bump core-js * fc97f05850f2b0af8f0426d423764e41fbfa5472 New: Optionally include Custom Format Score for Discord On File Import notifications [ #10313 ] * 644876123d0745a0aee471b0726a6bf6827e276c Convert MovieTitleLink to TypeScript [ #10322 ] * 540659a799ae41286eb5ab3ed2583de26f9908eb Convert First Run to TypeScript [ #10307 ] * 288668f7e6a59b98488c81ec31c7390737ae0d28 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fcf3be42d5a400f51b72e239f38e337f2cde7458 Automated API Docs update * 16e218501e8ab91ef72d45feea9227c4941aa217 Fixed: Limit redirects after login to local paths * caf2d33c11f25c5a802deca4aee14bf1f114f07d Fixed: Keeping search results when Missing/Cutoff Unmet repopulates * bc918ed3b5e6b1c18fd7d6f91db0282fe7e1a472 Fix: Use indexer's Multi Languages setting for pushed releases [ #10273, #10321 ] * df77474314fff40de38073872ffb8478a09cb875 Fixed: Improve sorting movies by release dates * bf844715099d4dc702e25b940a7bec0ee53711b3 Automated API Docs update * d346d969deedff47af97059bc36dea8782a9aa3f Fixed: Validate root folder existence when adding movie * 14b125ccd959c5a72f8914dd8ad7cf72849dcc69 Automated API Docs update * da5323a08f2dbe42024f2d3e82d2d901abcbeb16 New: Bulk manage custom formats * 672b3514977ee66395b6dccaaffa4290b5b4406f Bump version to entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.11.0.9244
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 7b43c2e345741de183c2acd56afd10886f120b11 Fixed: Loading movie images after placeholder in Safari [ #10474 ]
  • dc599b6531aca7906122e6e13402fe4cb1ceddaa Sort allowed sorting keys
  • 1421179654d71c0cf1e6db8bfe27cd928798add2 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 41dcf32e24119eeb24de84791129ee08e3547b25 Fix translations for MovieMonitoredSelectInput
  • 7a813a44b6589ba8cd75fd3c1d4daa3e80790001 Use UTC to calculate movie status
  • 54a50590801ead63b3e20a4dd272aa181ebe6481 Convert AvailabilitySelectInput to TypeScript
  • adaf7444d31ab450eb750fe11358753a7313c094 Add movie availability descriptions
  • 49d11e59b3b31a15069627322cf9ca8aff1f8e49 Fixed: Telegram Log Message
  • a7eb4a4a0454ffab149a34a800abe519eceeaf6a Automated API Docs update
  • 66a6a663ba28f5a2bba252a8c4483ddeffa5bfab Prevent line wraps on mobile for ratings
See More * f735e318358eb2cfdc1c4b425418f4671bce5f2f New: Trakt ratings * b8f1286abb8299b764aad6194c4b37b00b3f41ea Fixed: Sorting queue by columns * 9df45199d09edaa8d5c01ad5f387dd27276da812 Reprocessing manual import items unable to detect sample [ #10463 ] * a692c35b033210e5a7d108997445b4a80ef0b46d Automated API Docs update * ddcad270c3237fe48e3703190a2c3c1efa83f973 Fix description for API key as query parameter * b06f1d7c127551bca51f3a6cd86a95d10cd934a7 Bump version to 5.11.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=127&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.12.2.9335
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 889d0710046e34c7173b64067ecdd0a9ee5b177a New: Display items tags on import lists index
  • 0049922ab6809be48e96726a4f4006d711051b7d Include exception message in SkyHook failure message
  • 3c995a0fff4caf8e68e398dc263887c06211a84f Bump babel packages
  • 430719baacd6cf97ec2eb8a64d77efa0aefbe32d Remove unused gulp packages
  • 9928d711a3bb72d40c99541bfc530eb7bcad811b Trim multiple occurrences of ending separators in filename
  • f90b43b3e1c7d938eaaf290148b488d3b814968a Simplify parsing IMDb and TMDb urls as search terms
  • 64122b4cfb3bf53bdbf5c924baee5e1b0814501a Auto-detect building on macOS ARM (#10539)
  • 7912a942f71256efde95d715474a950248267357 Bump frontend packages
  • 0a7607bb62b26ecec2fff09bd7f48e1a55144437 Bump dotnet packages
  • beeb5204b825f669083cfff56e6a581d0737b5b5 New: Parse IMDB and TMDB URLs as search terms
See More * ab13fb6e99d61c312580d38a70759dd135438dd0 Fix index variable in fuse worker * 2a3d595a66244c3256b87798c3f385bf411e7cc1 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 958a863d8f62bd24714ab132f85c48f10251dcdb Recompare file size after import file if necessary * 8b7884deb0a6ed5d45e01462600a90706f9f3208 Automated API Docs update * 9a22e1c791750fb356a98cba3e402cb9cc348a36 Bump browserslist-db * f0f828491b7002cfa0613241b2b4e73c32d6c4e9 Fixed: Copy to clipboard in non-secure contexts [ #10525 ] * 7f3d107eda88eaa3c5b7e131bdb0f4d6714b79d4 Convert ClipboardButton to TypeScript [ #10452 ] * ce4477eeacc05356752e7757ae35274e68a590ca Improve filename examples for movies naming * 8b64f873f47e732cf318c2874695f087261c948d Convert Naming options to TypeScript * 38bd06096047dfc235451c63938a03c929190df1 Convert FormInputButton to TypeScript * 7c243cb6e8ec9df123f6ecd4f5707668287b69a9 Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON * b29dee63f4b493c1e5e28a240bb05155bd7ff199 Use the first allowed quality for cutoff met rejection message with disabled upgrades * f6542bab0a6c05760b4d926d9d87720ed136f38a New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base * da1b53b7e250df25ebfc5e02f32054d4c6cdced8 Bump macOS runner version to 13 * 0deae95782f2cb21cbbbd15470d0fc8b037a7e61 Bump version to 5.12.2 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=130&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.13.1.9378
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 234e23eb4725549629e90150188acb6b7ec3baa3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 748d88852034df43d2497555c9316948c14cebed Sync metadata changes to UI
  • 00d50a030c6507b620aeeafa61c3d1258a33509a Translate metadata settings
  • 017fa5ad80af2d997e103b5b29cfb3f7d867daae New: Group updates for the same movie for Kodi and Emby / Jellyfin [ #10150 ]
  • d5fb1c55c6536431e7b9eb01aa59eb99c79b3f0a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • 2c9292c249c6269e3ee1b2427d5c4dd2553505ae Save ImdbId for grabbed movie events
  • 6747b742718a84fbb380d6eadef329229a6738d4 Convert History to TypeScript [ #10230, #10390, #10247 ]
See More * 13f10906f1b7a725cf939e4db0bca72f44e5b1f2 Fixed: PWA Manifest with URL base [ #10317, #10329 ] * 25d08a67e4bbecc526c09488eb64a2883e9c021f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * aadefbe3b0886a6d85c4f41a90f28ae5405ef24a Rename 'On Import' to 'On File Import' and 'On Upgrade' to 'On File Upgrade' [ #10164 ] * d99a7e9b8aa9ce67dffa5bd4802b12b33c609ff6 Convert Components to TypeScript [ #10378, #10400, #10425 ] * dc29526961c3f1a5bc37d0127b68b82e85a4d9d8 Convert App to TypeScript [ #10233 ] * f8e47fbdc731527aaf60f679477e144c05b23cdf Tooltips for certification and runtime on details page * 56a7725e52b7ae9485876e2e1332dbeafcbfc92e Improve warning for missing release dates on movie details page when year is not set [ #10569 ] * abf1b9d6cf0d8e3dfbd71337d7536af050957715 Fallback to text searches for FL only if year is defined * dd90bf53dd8c146ebf4ab0a02ec5ee1ac0bbe8bf Bump version to 5.13.1 * cd29c0c9c84ce05913bbdb69d542717de75dd792 Fix stable branch label in update * 9986d04d3614336395c55b3d00313812662f609b Automated API Docs update * f900d623dc46b18a4d33c98fecf24a980ac45b39 New: Allow major version updates to be installed * 84b507faf3c6f28b649479a0d5412007a220f7e8 New: Romania and India added to list of Certification Countries * adb27123df33380f74acfa3a213daa8f38c5f873 Natural sorting for tags list in the UI * a06792b9231c068a65d5832e9c2df7cee7e651c7 New: Sync updates to UI for providers (#10550) * d90ee3ae11bb54f79a00fc94ecfedae37d13e056 Fixed: Release Year mandatory to generate valid file formats * ff38afd198e4078dd1c29fa777403c9c2e52a6d6 Fixed: Add only movies with release dates from monitored collections * db70c06b8ba68e736470bc9a130dcf9da8e0345d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fb7656be5638bd5cf5b01bb9c06df39a14854040 New: Parse pt-BR releases as Brazilian Portuguese (#10554) * 3287e7cdecbba2cec8bb58ce9aa1dd07bb2aa1fa Bump dotnet to 6.0.35 * 0761e27cfa73c68e18866a091066b517fa2ab780 New: Parse ES as Spanish * 4f47bb39ac62b14e315eae5efb87624168b1dacf Bump version to 5.13.0 This list of changes was [auto entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.14.0.9383
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 781e0c9d1c607ed35dd1595e929bf2a2e5009863 Fixed: Optional square and round brackets for "{Release Year}"
  • c946ed83f958384200a41cc8e60623d80893ac26 Fixed: Stopped/Started as initial state for qBittorrent v5.0
  • 9aecf94e8e0e6b68711145a6669e780af09affe7 Bump version to 5.14.0

This list of changes was auto generated.
